'''''Muirne's Better Butter''''' is a weekly [[Reputation Request]] that occurs in [[Fontaine]].

==Steps==
# Give three [[Butter]] to Muirne

==Request Details==
"Tales of Humanity":<br>
Bread without butter is like a Melusine out of water.<br>
Soft, fragrant, as smooth as... well, butter!<br>
Ah, there's just never enough of it though.<br>
Why do chefs always butter their bread so thinly?<br>
Would anyone be so kind as to bring me a little high-quality {{color|buzzword|butter}}? I've been so busy at work, I just can't find the time to go buy some myself.

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|Muirne needs 3 servings of Butter.}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{DIcon|Quest}} About Butter...
::'''Muirne:''' Whenever I go to eat some bread, they never give me enough butter to spread on it. I'm thinking that maybe I should just bring butter with me in the future.
::'''Muirne:''' Did you bring the butter?
::{{DIcon|Quest}} Butter's ready.
:::'''Muirne:''' Butteriffic! Oh, butter, my butter... Without butter, bread isn't even worth eating.
::{{DIcon}} Not yet.
:::'''Muirne:''' I want a buttload of butter, so I can wait 'til you can give it to me all at once.
{{Dialogue End}}
